name: Some Questions about Tofu Online Quiz | Hobbies | 5 Questions

questions.explanation:
China.

	First produced in China in the B.C. era.

questions.text: Tofu is high in cholesterol. True or False?
questions.explanation:
False.

	Tofu is actually cholesterol free!

questions.text: True or false: Tofu is high in protein.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Tofu, like many other bean products, is high in protein. Replace some meat in your diet with tofu and your body will thank you!

questions.text: The soft style tofu is also called ______-style tofu. (Choose the word that best fits the blank.)
questions.explanation:
Japanese.

	Some people call this tofu 'silken tofu'.  It is wonderful chopped up into cubes and placed in miso soup, or any other soups for that matter.  You will find the soft style tofu in Korean and Chinese soups as well.

questions.text: True or false: Tofu is easy to digest.
questions.explanation:
True.

	It's really a great alternative to a lot of meat in your diet...please consider eating more tofu, and thanks for playing this quiz!
